extendedInfo.description: Smartleeâ¢ makes it easy to see your electricity, water, and gas usage, to set and control thermostats and smart plugs, and to save money by reducing your consumption. We call it: See, Set, Save. Application features enable you to:â¨â¢ Monitor your energy and natural resource consumption through real-time meter readings and yearly, monthly, weekly or daily historical reports â¢ Control Smart Energy thermostats and smart plugs from anywhere â¢ Set and track monthly goals for reducing your environmental footprint and saving money â¢ Receive energy saving tips and price change notificationsâ¢ Link with Facebook to share your results with friendsREQUIREMENTS: To use Smartlee, you must have a supported electric, gas, or water meter or other Smart Energy device that can communicate wirelessly with an Internet gateway. Visit www.livesmartlee.com for more information. DEMO MODE: The Smartlee demo mode allows you to explore the app without requiring live devices. ABOUT US: Digi International is making wireless M2M easy by developing reliable products and solutions to connect and securely manage local and remote electronic devices over a network or via the web. For more information, visit www.digi.com.
